title: Savory Rolled Cakes (Banh Cuon)
description:
Sharing a recipe for delicious rolled cakes filled with ground pork, mushrooms, onions and all the accompaniments.  This video takes you through the easy steps plus shares tips and tricks for guaranteed success.  This is a classic Viet dish everyone should learn to make.  Enjoy!

Written recipe: http://runawayrice.com/main-dishes/savory-rolled-cakes-banh-cuon/

Links to other videos: 
Traditional Fish Sauce Dipping Sauce:  http://youtu.be/ws-tY4xvHZg

Tools used in this video:

Seville Classics Bamboo Cutting Board with Removable Cutting Mats http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B001DNZI6O/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=390957&creativeASIN=B001DNZI6O&linkCode=as2&tag=runawayriceyt-20&linkId=O56AYMVCBTV5TS43

Pyrex Prepware 2-Cup Measuring Cup, Red Graphics, Clear
http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00LGLHU0K/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=390957&creativeASIN=B00LGLHU0K&linkCode=as2&tag=runawayriceyt-20&linkId=CN27WKZ3LJQKRLNL

Royal Kitchenware Non-Stick Frying Pan - Aluminum Heavy Gauge Skillet - Scratch Resistant with 2 Layers of Non-Stick Coating (8 inch)
http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00NAR88A4/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=390957&creativeASIN=B00NAR88A4&linkCode=as2&tag=runawayriceyt-20&linkId=7JJF6TPNY5NBCYE4

Website:     http://runawayrice.com
Facebook:  http://fb.com/therunawayrice
Twitter:       http://twitter.com/runawayrice
Instagram:  http://instagram.com/runawayrice#
________________________________

Ingredients:

Batter:
1 cup rice flour
1 cup tapioca starch
2 cups room temperature water
2 cups boiling water
1/4 tsp salt
1 Tbsp vegetable oil

Filling:
1/8 oz dried wood ear mushrooms
1/2 medium yellow onion, approximately 4 oz
3/4 lb ground pork
1/4 tsp salt
1/4 tsp pepper
vegetable oil for cooking

Additional Ingredients:
fresh herbs: cilantro, mint and Thai basil, plucked and washed
bean sprouts, trimmed and washed
1 cucumber
steamed pork roll
fried onions
fish sauce dipping sauce  http://youtu.be/ws-tY4xvHZg

Yields: 30-35 rolls, 4-6 servings

Nguyên liệu:

120 g bột gạo
120 g bột năng
480 ml nước nhiệt độ phòng
480 ml nước sôi
¼ m. cà phê muối
1 m. canh dầu ăn

Nhân:
15 g nấm mèo khô 
½  củ hành tây vừa - chừng 120 g
350 g thịt heo xay
¼ m. cà phê muối
¼ m. cà phê tiêu xay

Dầu ăn để tráng bánh

Ăn kèm:
Rau thơm:  húng lủi, ngò, húng quế, nhặt và rửa
Giá, nhặt và rửa
1 trái dưa chuột
Hành phi
Giò lụa
Nước mắm chấm

Cho: 30-35 cuốn, 4-6 phần ăn
